ONE

FAN-MADE WEBSITE.

The Straw Hat Crew

Monkey D. Luffy's Pirate Crew

The Crew From The East

Originating from East Blue. These pirates have made a name for themselves, they are known throughout the Grand Line as the Straw Hat Pirates.

They have had a massive influence in the 1st half of the Grand Line. From stopping a war in Alabasta to destroying the military base found in Enies Lobby.

Led by the adventure crazed Monkey D. Luffy who partook in the most recent pirate-navy war which also resulted in the downfall of the biggest military base in the World, Marineford.

This war was soon to be known as the "War of the Strongest". Since then, they have been missing for almost 2 years, with their location still being unknown.

Due to the most recent controversy in the Fishman Island, some speculate that the Straw Pirates are still roaming around the sea, this time in the 2nd half of the Grand Line, The New World.

The Strongest

The Strongest Characters in One Piece

The power rankings

The cast of characters in the One Piece universe leaves almost nothing to the imagination, from a talking reindeer with the power to transform into different forms to a man capable of creating black holes and earthquakes with his bare hands.

There are a plethora of powers that exist within the world of One Piece, enough to make people like myself ask: "Who is the strongest?".

Though it may be impossible to give a definitive ranking as there are a lot of factors to consider. But we can surely give an almost accurate estimation, based on the current feats that each character has shown.

And with that reasoning, I present to you my list of the strongest characters in One Piece.

The Video Gallery

Favourite Moments In One Piece

The Journey To the end

These are the Moments that make the story of One Piece stand out from other Manga/Anime. These moments are the reason why the show celebrated it's 20th Birthday last year.

What was supposed to be a 5 year project became a show that was loved by everyone. Moments like Vivi deciding not to join the Straw Hats, Chopper and Dr. Hiriluk's Back Story, Saying goodbye to the Going Merry are examples of some of the moments that brought tears to many viewers.

It is thanks to the writing of Eiichiro Oda that the fans get to enjoy a story worth seeing the end to. I am sure that I, like many other people are waiting to see if Luffy does become the King of Pirates. With that being said Here are some of my favourite Moments in One Piece.
